resources.string: \'Added on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Saved on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Finalized on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Sent on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Sending failed on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Deleted on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Modified on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry getting and filling out a blank form.
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry sending finalized forms before viewing.
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry finalizing saved forms before sending.
The activity you are trying to start requires a permission which is not granted.
Without these permissions Collect can\'t access your forms or save answers. Reopen the app when you are ready to grant them.
Without these permissions Collect can\'t record your location. Please try again when you are ready to grant them.
Without this permission Collect can\'t access the camera. Please try again when you are ready to grant it.
Without this permission Collect can\'t access the microphone. Please try again when you are ready to grant it.
Without this permission Collect can\'t access accounts. Please try again when you are ready to grant it.
ODK Collect does not make calls but it needs to access certain properties about your device such as the phone number and device ID.
XForm parse error for %1$s: %2$s is missing or invalid.
An error occurred while loading the form. Please try again.
Unable to edit this saved form because the corresponding blank form is not present or was deleted.\n\nForm ID: %1$s
This form cannot be edited once it has been marked as finalized. It may be encrypted.
Remove group \"%s\" and all of its sub-groups?
This form is too complex for this device. Try simplifying expressions or ask for help on the forum.
Internal error: step to prompt failed.
You are at the end of %s.
Saved name must not be blank!
Not exactly one record for this instance!
Not exactly one blank form matches this jr_form_id.
Phone does not support RSA encryption.
%s Form has not been saved as finalized.
Media could not be attached to form but is available at %1$s
The requested application is missing. Please manually enter the reading.
The external application did not provide expected information.
The requested printer is not installed. Please install the printer.
Something went wrong. We did not get valid OSM data.
Place the barcode inside the rectangle
Selected file is not a valid image
Tap the screen to take a picture
Front camera not available on this device
This device doesn\'t support the Camera2 API.
Application returned an invalid file type
Tap the screen to start recording
Recording started. Tap again to stop
This form records audio in the background. You must grant permission to use your microphone. If you do not, you will not be able to open this form.
This form requests background audio recording. Disabling it will stop recording and discard existing audio. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Recording will not begin immediately. You must re-open the form to record.
You will not be able to recover this file once it is deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You must stop recording before leaving this screen.
An error occurred while attaching the media: %s
Your sortby column should contain only numeric values. Conflicting value was \'%s\'.
Syntax error in search() function: The function needs 1, 4 or 6 arguments.
Syntax error in search() function : Unrecognised function \'%s\'.
Syntax error in search() function: \'%s\' was not evaluated as a function.
The search handler returned a object of type \'%s\'.
Could not import data from %1$s. Reason: %2$s
The ExternalDataManager has not been initialized.
External data for %1$s has not been imported. Perhaps you forgot to include the %2$s.csv file with your form?
Bearing cannot be collected: device is missing accelerometer, magnetic field sensor or both.
This form requires you to identify yourself
You need to explain the reason for changes to this form
Sorry, %s basemaps are not available on this device. Please choose another basemap in General Settings > Maps.
Unable to access Google Maps. Is Google Play Services installed?
There are no layer files in %1$s that are supported by the %2$s basemap.
Above are all the layer files in %1$s that are supported by the %2$s basemap.
This form wants to track your location but Google Play Services are not available.
This form wants to track your location but location providers are disabled. Please enable in Android settings.
This form wants to track your location but tracking is disabled. Please enable in the %1$s menu above.
This form tracks your location. You can disable tracking in the %1$s menu above.
GPS is disabled on your device. Would you like to enable it?
Feature already created. Would you like to clear the feature?
Discard changes and return to ODK?
Must have at least 3 points to create Polygon
Must have at least 2 points to create Polyline
Points entered: %1$d (recording every %2$d sec, accuracy %3$d m)
Points entered: %1$d (recording every %2$d min, accuracy %3$d m)
Long press to place mark or tap add marker button.
Sorry, you have not selected any forms!
Invalid username or password for server: %s
Failed to upload media file that does not exist: %1$s
Background send running, please try again shortly
ODK auto send permission failure, please make sure your have granted all required permissions
This is an update to a form you have
If you keep having this problem, report it to the person who asked you to collect data.
Collect can\'t reach the server at %s. Did you enter the URL correctly?
Collect can\'t connect securely to the server at %s. Did you enter the URL correctly?
The server %s provided an invalid response.
Sorry, %1$s of %2$s selected form(s) failed to delete!
Sorry, a form delete action is already in progress!
Leading or trailing whitespace not allowed in passwords
Leading or trailing whitespace not allowed in usernames
Will be removed in a future version. Please use /formList and /submission on your server.
Forms must set a submission URL. If they don\'t, this URL will be used.
Automatically download updated versions of forms
Only the newest version will appear in Fill Blank Form
Deletes finalized forms and media after sending to server
Mark form as finalized by default
Maximum pixels of the long edge of the image
Use external app for audio recording
Affects forms added directly to instances folder.
Anonymous usage data helps the ODK team prioritize fixes and features.
These values will be added to forms that have username, email and/or telephone preloaded fields to identify the person submitting data.
Uncheck to hide from Main Menu
Uncheck to hide from General Settings
Uncheck to hide from Form Entry
Blank forms (forms folder, forms database, itemsets database)
All selected data will be deleted permanently. There is no undo.

Configure the device to prevent users from bypassing this setting?

The changes are:
• Disable Edit Saved Form
• Disable Save Form
• Disable Go To Prompt
• Set Constraint processing to Validate upon forward swipe

You may wish to review the following settings:

• Edit Saved Form
• Save Form
• Go To Prompt
• Constraint processing
Unable to make API calls. If you are running a local build, please review the project readme.
You have selected Google Sheets as your server, please select a corresponding Google account in the General Settings before continuing
Search for forms. Or select \'My Drive\' below to browse.
Access denied. Please make sure the spreadsheet owner has granted you edit permission.
Spreadsheet is missing the following columns: %1$s
Encrypted forms can\'t be submitted to Google Sheets.
To submit forms via Google Sheets you have to set up your Google account in the Server settings.
No columns found in the form to upload.
More than one media folder detected, please remove one and try again
Are your colleagues still collecting data on paper? Share ODK Collect with them.
Your (hopefully positive) review increases the visibility of the App in the Play Store.
ODK is used to collect data for social good in challenging environments.
Join the forum to get support, request features, contribute code/translations!
We stand on the shoulders of giants!
Maximum characters limit reached: QR code can\'t be generated for all settings
Contains sensitive information: admin and server passwords
QR code does not contain admin or server passwords. Tap to configure
QR code does not contain valid settings
QR Code not found in the selected image
Current settings are corrupt. From the admin settings, reset settings or import working ones.
Please wait. This could take a few minutes.
Could not delete \'%s\'. Please delete the file manually and re-download the form.
You have downloaded two different forms with the same form ID and version. Maybe they were the same form uploaded at different times or to different servers. In any case, you should delete one.

This form records the audio from your device's microphone.

You can use the volume indicator to make sure the microphone is close enough to the sound you need to record.

To stop the recording please exit this form.

For more information please contact the person who asked you to collect data.
You already have a project with these connection settings. Do you want to switch to the existing project or add a new one?
All blank forms, submissions and settings will be permanently deleted.
You have unsent submissions. To delete the project, you must first send or delete those submissions.
Background jobs are running. Please try again later.
After you add your project, you can configure it in General and Admin Settings
To open this form, you must first open ODK Collect and switch to the project that contains it.
